ValidationRule.description: You cannot update Credit Assessment Details
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ($Profile.Name <> "System Administrator" && $Profile.Name <> "Credit Management" && $Profile.Name <> "Mypost Business Help & Support Community User" && $Profile.Name <> "Enterprise Onboarding" && $Profile.Name <> "BG Base") && (ISCHANGED( APT_Credit_Assessment_Status__c ) || ISCHANGED( APT_Credit_Amount_Required__c ) || ISCHANGED(APT_Legal_Entity_Name__c) || ISCHANGED(APT_Business_Type__c) || ISCHANGED(APT_Assessment_Type__c) || ISCHANGED(APT_ABN__c) || ISCHANGED(APT_Proposal__c) || ISCHANGED(APT_ACN__c) || ISCHANGED(APT_Business_Name__c) || ISCHANGED(APT_Organisation_Name__c) || ISCHANGED(APT_Existing_Customer_Flag__c) || ISCHANGED(APT_ABR_Report__c) || ISCHANGED(APT_Australia_Post_Arrears__c) || ISCHANGED(APT_ASIC_Report__c) || ISCHANGED(APT_Comments__c) || ISCHANGED(APT_Charge_Account__c) || ISCHANGED(APT_Entity_Type__c) || ISCHANGED(APT_Account_Type__c) || ISCHANGED(APT_Business_History_Age__c))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot update Credit Assessment as it is already Submitted.
